column2: Sunil Abeyrathna with Buddhika Alagiyawanna for the Petitioner-Petitioner
This appeal  is preferred to set aside the order of the Learned High Court Judge of

column1: Balapitiya  dated  8/2/2006  and  for  a  declaration  that  the  Respondent Petitioner  is
entitle to the land in dispute and for cost.
